price: 33. Waxaana siinnay calaamado9 ay ku sugnaayeen imtixaan cad.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: 9. Sida in lagu hareeyey daruuraha, loo soo dejiyey Manni iyo Salwaa, biyo looga burqiyey dhagax, badda cas oo loo kala dhanbalay, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
